level_up: Level Up! You are now level {level}!
rested: You rest and recover your strength...
respawn: You respawn at the starting village.
merchants_left: Merchants have left and the market is closed! Please come back in {time}.
max_companions: You already have the maximum number of companions (4).
no_companions: You have no companions yet. Visit the tavern to hire some!
no_connected_areas: No connected areas to travel to.
unequip_first: Unequip the item before selling it.
cannot_rest: You cannot rest in {area}. It's too dangerous!
weather_sunny_desc: The sun is shining outside and you feel great!
weather_rainy_desc: It's raining outside, but you can still have fun indoors!
weather_snowy_desc: The snow is falling and the world looks magical!
weather_stormy_desc: A storm is raging outside, but you can find shelter and stay safe!
weather_null_desc: There is no apparent weather here...
time_dawn_desc: The first light of dawn breaks over the horizon.
time_morning_desc: The morning sun rises high, filling the world with light.
time_noon_desc: The sun is at its zenith, the heat of the day is upon you.
time_afternoon_desc: The sun begins its slow descent as the day mellows.
time_dusk_desc: The sky turns to shades of orange and purple as dusk falls.
time_evening_desc: Stars begin to twinkle in the darkening evening sky.
time_night_desc: The world is hushed under the blanket of night.
time_midnight_desc: The witching hour is upon you; the world is silent and dark.
subtitle: Text-Based CLI Fantasy RPG
author: Created by {author}
description: A comprehensive exploration and grinding-driven RPG experience
training_description: Train to improve your stats! Each training session affects all your stats.
training_failed: Training failed! All stats decrease by
class_warrior_description: Strong melee fighter with high HP and defense
class_mage_description: Powerful spellcaster with high MP and magical abilities
class_rogue_description: Agile fighter with high speed and critical strike chance
class_hunter_description: Experienced tracker and archer with an incredible aim
class_bard_description: A musician who uses their song to inspire allies and weaken enemies
class_paladin_description: Holy warrior who combines martial prowess with divine magic to smite enemies and protect allies
class_druid_description: Nature's guardian who can shapeshift into animals and command the power of the earth
class_priest_description: Devoted healer who channels divine energy to mend wounds and protect the faithful
